channel.title: Event listeners
channel.description: Hi, im very new to satisfactory modding and UE blueprints workflow and i was wondering how can i listen for a specific event. Like when the player picks up some foliage. Because i know how to do it with code but the whole blueprints stuff confuses me quite a bit. Thanks :)

item.title: Event listeners

@IsmaelTrentin wrote:

Hi, im very new to satisfactory modding and UE blueprints workflow and i was wondering how can i listen for a specific event. Like when the player picks up some foliage. Because i know how to do it with code but the whole blueprints stuff confuses me quite a bit.
